page.title: 09GEDNEY WILDLIFE RESERVE
page.content: Mr. Neville Scrimshaw , a local farmer , of Rectory Farm , has created a small wild life preserve at the side of his property . He has flooded part of the land and fenced it off . Birds of all types have nested in this sanctuary . Mr. Scrimshaw encourages people of all ages to visit . Intensive agriculture has driven a great deal of wild life from the area and so it is pleasant to observe attempts to attract it back . Nature continures to resist efforts to eradicate it . Rabbits have burrowed under Gedney School and kestrels nest every year in Gedney Church tower .
